User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"产品升级方案"，设置字体为"Microsoft YaHei"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "产品升级方案", level=1);set_font_style("Microsoft YaHei");

User instruction: 添加目录，并设置为三级目录。
添加二级标题"升级背景"、"功能优化"和"实施计划"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "升级背景", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "功能优化", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "实施计划", level=2);

User instruction: 在"升级背景"下添加带编号的列表项。
Feasible API sequence: add_list_item(doc_path, "用户需求变化", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "技术发展趋势", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "竞品分析对比", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "市场竞争压力", style="List Number");

User instruction: 在"功能优化"下插入一个对比表格，4行4列。
Feasible API sequence: add_table(doc_path, 4, 4);set_cell_text(table, 0, 0, "功能模块");set_cell_text(table, 0, 1, "当前版本");set_cell_text(table, 0, 2, "升级版本");set_cell_text(table, 0, 3, "优化效果");

User instruction: 在"实施计划"下插入一个甘特图。
Feasible API sequence: create_bar_chart(["需求分析", "方案设计", "开发测试", "灰度发布", "全面上线"], [2, 3, 6, 2, 1], title="升级实施进度", xlabel="阶段", ylabel="周数");
